application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: HS2 request for approval of plans and specifications under condition imposed by Schedule 17 to the High Speed Rail (London - West Midlands) Act 2017, relating to a vehicle access road and Auto Transformer Station (ATS) structure of a combined area totalling 576m2 (ATS = 261.28m2 and Access Road = 315.12m2), with associated boundary fencing and artificial lighting, associated with the approved South Ruislip Vent Shaft Headhouse Schedule 17 (reference: 7215/APP/2020/2901).
decision_conditions: No objections are raised to the proposed building design, screening, earthworks and associated fencing and lighting.
Officers are of the opinion that the proposals, would not have a detrimental impact on a site of ecological value (i.e. a designated site) or an archaeological area of importance.

It is considered that there are no reasonably practicable measures which need to be taken for the purpose of mitigating the effect of the work or its operation in terms of its impact on the local environment / local amenity, in accordance with Paragraph 9 sub section (4)(a) of Schedule 17 of the Act.
